title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the UI where the label is displayed.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
OB: The label height remains unchanged after modifying the label font size in the UI.
EB: Expected behavior: After modifying the label font size, the label height should adjust accordingly.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the UI where the label is displayed.
2. Modify the font size of the label and observe if the label height updates to justify the new font size.
